original_text: He shall slay with the sword thy daughters in the field: and he shall make a fort against thee, and cast a mount against thee, and lift up the buckler against thee.
korean_text: 그가 들에 있는 너의 딸들을 칼로 죽이고 너를 치려고 사다리를 세우며 토성을 쌓으며 방패를 갖출 것이며

sentences.original_text: He shall slay with the sword
and he shall make a fort against thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 너를 대항하여 요새를 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: and cast a mount against thee
and lift up buckler against thee
